Translations.Text: Tumi tomara sumahana pratipalakara namara paraitrata arau mahima ghosana karaa
yijane srsti karaiche, tara pichata suthama karaiche
Arau yijane (bhagya) nirdharana karaiche tara pichata satpatha pradarsana karaiche
arau yijane trna-lata utpanna karaiche
tara pichata se'iboraka ka'la abarjanata parainata karaiche
Anatipalame ami tomaka patha karaama, phalata tumi napaharaiba
kerala allahe yi bicarae tara bahirae. Niscaya te'om prakasya arau aprakasya sakalo jane
Arau ami tomara babe sahaja patha sugama karai dima
Eteke upadesa diya, yadi upadesa phalaprasu haya
upadesa siye'i grahana karaiba yiye bhaya karae
Arau yi hatabhagya si iyaka agraahya karaiba
si bhayabaha ju'ita praraesa karaiba
Tara pichata si tata mrtyubarano karaiba noraaraiba arau jiraita'o thakiba noraaraiba
Niscaya saphalata labha karaiba yiye atmasud'dhi karaiba
Arau tara pratipalakara nama smarana karaiba arau chalata adaya karaiba
Kintu tomaloke prthiraira jiranaka praadhan'ya diya
athaca akhiraata sarbottama arau sthayi
Niscaya iyara barnana ache purbararti chahiphasamuhata
ibraahima arau muchara chahiphasamuhata
Tomara ocarata acchannakarai (kiyamatara) sambada ahichene
se'idina kichumana mukhamandala ha’ba aranata
karmaklanta, paraisraanta
sihamta praraesa karaiba jbalanta ju'ita
uttapta utala nijaraara pani pana karaibalai diya ha’ba
sihamtara babe kamitabisista ghamhara bahirae ana kono khadya nathakiba
i sihamtara pusti'o sadhana nakaraiba arau ksudha'o nibrtta nakaraiba
Arau se'idina kichumana mukhamandala ha’ba anandojjbala
nija karmara saphalyata paraitrpta
su'ucca jannatata
tata sihamte kono anarthaka katha sunibalai napaba
tata thakiba prabahamana nijaraa
tata thakiba unnata sayyasamuha
Arau prastuta thakiba panapatrasamuha
arau sarai saraikai rakha garausamuha
arau bistrta parai thoraa dalicasamuha
ihamte utara pine drstipata nakarae neki, kenekai taka srsti karaa haiche
arau akasara phale, kenekai taka urd'dhata sthapana karaa haiche
arau parbatasamuhara phale, se'ibora kenekai pratisthita karaa haiche
arau prthiraikhanara phale, kidarae taka bistrta karaa haiche
eteke tumi upadesa diya, tumito kerala ejana upadesadata
tumi sihamtara oparata sakti prayogakarai nahaya
Kintu konoba'i mukha ghuraa'i la’le athaba kupharai karaile
tente allahe taka mahasasti pradana karaiba
Niscaya amara ocarate'i sihamtara pratyarartana
Arau sihamtara hicapa-nikaca amarae'i dayitba
Phajarara samayara sapata
sapata daha raatira
sapata yora arau biyorara
sapata raatira, yetiya i bidaya laya
Iyara majata bodhasampanna byaktira babe drrha pramana na'ine
tumi dekha na'ine, tomara pratipalake ada sampradayara lagata ki acarana karaichila
iraama gotrara lagata, yihamte adhikarai achila su'ucca prasadara
yara samatulya (jati) kono desate srsti karaa horaa na'i
arau chamuda sampradayara lagata (ki acarana karaichila) yisakale bhaiyamata sila kati ghara nirmana karaichila
arau suladandara adhikarai phira'a'unara lagata (ki acarana karaichila)
yisakale desata simalanghana karaichila
tara pichata tata asanti brd'dhi karaichila
Phalata tomara pratipalake sihamtara oparata sastira cabuka maraile
Niscaya tomara pratipalaka satarka drsti raakhe
Arau manuhara prakrti enekuraa ye, yetiya tara pratipalake taka sanmana arau anugraha pradana karai paraiksa karae, tetiya si kaya, ‘mora pratipalake moka sanmanita karaiche’
Arau yetiya taka paraiksa karaibalai tara jiraika sankucita karai diye, tetiya si kaya, ‘mora pratipalake moka lanchita karaiche’
Ketiya'o nahaya, baram tomaloke etimaka samadara nakaraa
Arau tomaloke micakinaka khadya pradana karaibalai parasparae parasparaka utsahita nakaraa
arau tomaloke uttaraadhikarara sampada sampurnaraupe graasa karai peloraa
arau tomaloke dhana-sampadaka atikai bhalaporaa
ketiya'o nahaya. Yetiya prthiraikhanaka curna-bicurna karaa ha’ba
arau yetiya tomara pratipalaka agamana karaiba arau phiraistasakala saraibad'dhabharae upasthita ha’ba
arau se'idina jahannamaka upasthita karaa ha’ba, se'idina manuhe smarana karaiba, kintu e'i smarana tara kona kamata ahiba
(tetiya) si ka’ba, ‘haya! E'i jiranara babe ma'i yadi kiba agraima pathalohemtena
se'idina te'omra sastira darae sasti kone'o diba noraaraiba
Arau te'omra bandhonara darae bandhona ana kone'o diba noraaraiba
He prasanta atma
tumi tomara pratipalakara ocaralai ubhati aha santusta arau santosabhajana hai
arau mora bandasakalara antarbhukta hai yoraa
arau mora jannatata praraesa karaa
